amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in House Report 115-785 to increase funding for the Defense Health programs by $1 million and decreases the Operations and Maintenance account, Defense-Wide, by $1.3 million to improve coordination between DoD and the VA as both agencies study the effects of toxic exposure to burn pits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A023) offered by Mr. Welch.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Welch amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
